item.dc:creator: @ERS ERS
item.description:
@ERS wrote:

i need help with making “” "+playerName+ " has just logged off here is my code

		if(playerRights == 4) {
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
					c2.sendMessage(" <col=132>[<img=4> Donater] <col=30>" +playerName+ " has just logged in.");
				}
			}
		}

Read full topic
